entry.title: CNC Dual Axis Hydraulic Tapping Machine
entry.content:
Fully automatic tapping machine, adopts PLC control and gear

transmission. It is synthesized from feeding,

clamping, tapping, and unloading, and can process

internal threads with different pitches. One person

can operate multiple machines. It greatly saves labor

costs, reduces labor intensity, and improves

production safety. It is an ideal special equipment for

machining internal threaded workpiece at present.

Motors with different powers are equipped with high-quality speed reducers with different speed ratios, which perfectly adapts to the torque required for machining large threads and pitches of different materials.

Standard Customize

The main shaft stroke of 20~120mm can meet the requirements of blind holes, through holes, and different thread processing lengths. Adjusting the stroke distance can effectively improve production efficiency.

When machining different specifications of threads, the matching rotational speed varies depending on the amount of cutting and the required tapping torque. Adjusting the speed according to different specifications of thread processing can effectively ensure production efficiency.

Dual stations operate synchronously from feeding, clamping, tapping and unloading, resulting in a seamless operation and higher efficiency.

Choose different human-computer interactive operation panel modes for different operating groups, and button operation is more suitable for ordinary workers.

According to the overall dimensions of the workpiece you need to process, customize the feeding and clamping system structure to make it more suitable for your workpiece processing need.

Suitable for workpiece material

Suitable for workpiece material

thread

thread

thread

Double thread

Customer artifact case

Available in styles

Type E（Economic）

Type F（Functional）

Available in different specifications

Main motor Power 5.5Kw 7.5Kw 11Kw
Workpiece ID range M16~M32（≤3.0P） M16~M40（≤3.5P） M16~M45（≤4.0P）
Workpiece Length range 20~100mm 20~110mm 20~110mm
Accuracy 6H 6H 6H
Controlling type PLC PLC PLC
Dynamic Pneumatic, Hydraulic and Electric Pneumatic, Hydraulic and Electric Pneumatic, Hydraulic and Electric
Frequency converter Yes Yes Yes
Alarm light Yes Yes Yes

Creat quality with craftmanship, focus on achieving professionalism.

entry.title: CO2 Laser Machine 2X3m, 300W
entry.content:
Applications: Advertising industry, woodworking industry, lighting engineering, LED advertising, furniture manufacturing, handicrafts, craft products, signage, packaging, building models, industrial molds, decoration, clothing, textiles, leather, industrial fabrics , toys, models, building decoration, computer embroidery and cutting, packaging, paper and many other industries.

Advantages

Heavy precision machining bed

High precision imported guide rail rack

Servo motor precision reducer

Integrated aviation aluminum gantry

Performance characteristics:

This machine adopts CO2 laser tubes and high-performance CNC laser power supply: stable performance and convenient operation. Laser processing can be carried out on non-metallic materials such as bamboo, crystal, organic glass, marble, fabric, leather, rubber, plastic, etc.

Applicable materials: wood, bamboo slips, jade, marble, organic glass, crystal, plastic, clothing, paper, leather, rubber, ceramics, glass, and other non-metallic materials.

Applicable materials: advertising, handicrafts, leather, toys, models, building decoration, computer embroidery and cutting, packaging and paper industry.

Technical Specifications:

Type: CO2 non-metallic laser cutting machine

Machine Dimension: 2880mm*3800mm*1050mm

Working Area: 2000*3000mm

Machine body type: Plate and tube welding, heat treatment, and precision machining

Crossbeam structure: Aviation aluminum(6063-T5)

Control system: Ruida system DSP control technology, can be connected to a computer or used offline via USB

Transmission mode: Y-axis double drive precision grinding rack, X-axis belt (Y-axis optional belt)

Reducer: Japan Shinbo planetary reducer

Variable speed type: Precision planetary reducer

Motion rail: Taiwan lepin linear guide rail

Drive motor: Stepping, servo (optional)

Positioning accuracy: ≤±0.05mm

Idle speed: 0-1400mm/s

Cutting speed: 0-600mm/s

Laser tube type: Glass intracavity sealed off CO2 laser wavelength 10.6μm

Laser tube power: 300W

Power supply: 300W

Spindle cooling mode: Pure circulating water cooling, industrial chiller

Energy regulation: 0-100% stepless control, software internal 0-100% adjustable

Optical path structure: Constant light path system

Fire extinguisher system: Blow air to extinguish fire in following up

Work table type: Knife blade

Exhausting system: Upper and lower dual structure dual fan exhausting system

Supports graphics format HPGL BMP JPG TIF DXF AI EPS PLT

Support software to directly output AutoCAD CorelDRAW

Working temperature 5 ℃ -35 ℃

Working humidity 5% -95% (without condensation)

Working voltage 220v-50/60Hz
